doc.previous: On July 20 2008 Facebook introduced Facebook Beta a significant redesign of its user interface on selected networks The Mini Feed and Wall were consolidated profiles were separated into tabbed sections and an effort was made to create a cleaner look 165 After initially giving users a choice to switch Facebook began migrating all users to the new version starting in September 2008 166 On December 11 2008 it was announced that Facebook was testing a simpler signup process 167
